    Integrate Azure Arc and Azure Stack HCI - Characteristics and capabilities of Azure Arc

    »

    1. What component is required in order to establish a logical connection between an Arc enabled resource and Azure?

      The Log Analytics agent.

      The Microsoft Dependency agent.

      The Connected Machine agent.


    2. What is necessary in order to integrate an Azure Stack HCI cluster with Azure Arc?

      Install the Connected Machine agent on each Azure Stack HCI cluster node.

      Install the Microsoft Dependency agent on each Azure Stack HCI cluster node.

      Register the Azure Stack HCI cluster with Azure.
